text: Çorlu is a city in Turkey. It is located in the province of Tekirdağ at East Thrace. The land around Çorlu is mostly flat. Çorlu is located at a height. There are about 111 people per square kilometer. Çorlu is quite densely populated. Çorlu is the largest town in the area. The area around Çorlu is almost covered in fields. The climate is Mediterranean. The average temperature is 14 °C. The warmest month is July, at 27 °C, and the coldest is December, at 4 °C. The average rainfall is 892 millimeters per year. The wettest month is December, with 128 millimeters of rain, and the driest is July, with 17 millimeters. ==References== Category:Cities in Turkey Category:Marmara Region
title: Çorlu
